mapper.select: SELECT to_char(b.bty_dt, 'YYYY.MM.DD') bty_dt, a.animal_name animal_name, a.animal_breed animal_breed, c.cus_addr cus_addr, c.cus_name cus_name, c.cus_tel cus_tel, b.btm_type btm_type, b.bty_ox bty_ox FROM beauty b, animal a, customer c WHERE to_char(bty_dt, 'YYYY.MM.DD') = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AND b.animal_num = a.animal_num AND a.cus_tel = c.cus_tel

SELECT a.animal_num animal_num, to_char(b.bty_dt, 'YYYY.MM.DD') bty_dt, a.animal_name animal_name, a.animal_breed animal_breed, c.cus_addr cus_addr, c.cus_name cus_name, c.cus_tel cus_tel, b.btm_type btm_type, b.bty_ox bty_ox FROM beauty b, animal a, customer c WHERE to_char(bty_dt, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN replace(#{from_date}, '.', '') AND replace(#{to_date}, '.', '') AND b.animal_num = a.animal_num AND a.cus_tel = c.cus_tel
